title: Bg. 17.17
sanskrit: श्रद्धया परया तप्‍तं तपस्तत्‍त्रिविधं नरै: ।अफलाकाङ्‌‍क्षिभिर्युक्तै: सात्त्विकं परिचक्षते ॥ १७ ॥
transliteration: śraddhayā parayā taptaṁtapas tat tri-vidhaṁ naraiḥaphalākāṅkṣibhir yuktaiḥsāttvikaṁ paricakṣate

words_trans.aphala-\u0101k\u0101\u1e45k\u1e63ibhi\u1: who are without desires for fruits

literary_trans: This threefold austerity, performed with transcendental faith by men not expecting material benefits but engaged only for the sake of the Supreme, is called austerity in goodness.This threefold austerity, performed with transcendental faith by men not expecting material benefits but engaged only for the sake of the Supreme, is called austerity in goodness.
